task: Search online for the Grammy Award winners for Best Album of the Year in 2025. Write a summary article that includes a brief introduction of the album and the artist. and, if available, any upcoming concert dates. Add the most recent one concert date to the calendar.

items.thought: Search for 'Grammy Award Best Album of the Year 2025 winner.
items.action: Open Google in the current tab to begin the search for 'Grammy Award Best Album of the Year 2025 winner'

items.thought: Search for details about Beyoncé's album 'Cowboy Carter'
items.action: Extract details from search results on the Google page regarding Beyoncé's album 'Cowboy Carter'. Extract the concert dates for Beyoncé from the search results displayed.

items.thought: Open the document to insert the article content.
items.action: Agent writes the article to the word document.

items.thought: Create a new calendar event for Beyoncé's concert.
